thread.title: Bonus air miles offers on Gulf flight bookings
thread.title_full: Bonus air miles offers on Gulf flight bookings | The National

author: thenational.ae
title: Bonus air miles offers on Gulf flight bookings
text:
Double Etihad Guest miles to Seychelles 
Benefits: Fly business class to the Seychelles and earn double Etihad Guest miles on flights with Etihad Airways’ partner airline Air Seychelles – enough to take another trip back. The deal applies to travel taken between November 1 and December 13 and is only for flights between Abu Dhabi and the Seychelles operated by Air Seychelles. Miles will be credited within two weeks of the promotion ending. Beware of: Bookings must be made before October 31. 

Double Skywards miles to Bologna 
Benefits: Book a flight to Bologna, the newest Italian destination you can fly to with Emirates, and earn double Skywards miles in every class. The offer applies to flights taken between November 3 and December 31 this year. The offer is only valid on bookings made by October 31. Beware of: Remember that taxes and fuel surcharges are charged in addition to any air miles flight bookings.

Earn 30,000 bonus Qmiles to Los Angeles 
Benefits: Fly Premium Class to or from Los Angeles with Qatar Airways between January 1 and March 31, 2016, and earn 15,000 bonus Qmiles each way. Economy flights earn 7,500 bonus Qmiles each way. Customers must register at least 24 hours before they travel. Customers may use the deal more than once during the offer period. 
Beware of: The deal does not apply to families.

business@thenational.ae
